segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let's talk a bit about your, you know, your job. Like, um, what do you do for work?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! Yeah, I’m actually, um, a graphic designer at this, uh, small firm. It's kinda cool but, you know, stressful sometimes. Yeah, I also do some freelancing on the side. The clients are, like, all over the place, haha. But, um, my main job pays okay? I mean, I can save a bit!
